short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ensure that you are always accessing Amazon.com through the Smile program.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will ensure that you are always accessing Amazon.com through the Smile program to never miss a chance to help fund your favorite charity organization.
  
 It has some other convenience features as well, such as:
* Optionally adding referrer codes automatically to support your favorite content creators
* Optionally remove Amazon.com/AmazonSmile from the page title so your windows are easier to navigate
